front.title: PIDFConn: Extension to the Presence Information Data Format (PIDF) for Expressing Connectivity Features

abstract.t: The Presence Information Data Format (PIDF) defines a basic XMLformat for presence information. The optional contact element inPIDF contains a URI that ultimately resolves to a network interfaceon some device. Currently, the ways of expressing features relatedto that interface are limited. PIDFConn defines an extension to PIDFfor describing features of connectivities and the cost of usingservices.
